General.Name: Alchip Technologies Ltd
General.Description: Alchip Technologies, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, design, and manufacture of fabless application specific integrated circuits (ASIC) and system on a chip (SOC)in Japan, Taiwan, and China. The company offers SoC design solutions, such as advanced process design, low power, high performance technology, ultra-short TAT design, and cost benefits; turnkey solutions comprising package services, test services, production technology, quality assurance, and mass production support; IP services, such as integration and certification; and multi project wafer. The company's products are primarily used in network, storage, and computing devices; HD-TVs, mobile phones, digital still and video cameras, entertainment systems, portable media players, and tablet PCs; and surveillance systems, entertainment machines, and medical equipment and instruments. Alchip Technologies, Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
